description: It feels like an eternity to Micah Brandt as he waits for Tyler Wolf to return from his solitary boating adventure on the waters surrounding Fire Island. Micah waits by the pool bathing in the sunlight until his lover returns, who he seduces into the water where they kiss and embrace like newfound partners. Micah is a submissive bottom that takes complete pleasure in making sure his man has a good time. He pays total attention to Tyler’s needs, sucking his cock in the pool and forgetting about the world around him. When Tyler enters Micah and begins making love to him, it’s an exquisite explosion of emotion!
title: Micah Brandt Feels Total Passion for Tyler Wolf's Handsome Body
